CONFLUENCE-REPORTING::Plugin - 4.0.0-beta1
Last Published: 2014-03-07  | Version: 4.0.0-beta1
Overview
  • Summary
  • Goals
  • How to
Summary
  • Dependencies
  • Source

confluence-reporting:export

Full name:

org.bsc.maven:confluence-reporting-maven-plugin:4.0.0-beta1:export

Description:

Export a confluence page either in PDF or DOC

Attributes:

  • The goal is thread-safe and supports parallel builds.
  • Since version: 3.4.3.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
spaceKey String 3.4.3 Confluence target confluence's spaceKey
User property is: confluence.spaceKey.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
endPoint String 3.4.3 Confluence end point url
Default value is: http://localhost:8080/rpc/xmlrpc.
User property is: confluence.endPoint.
outputFile File 3.4.3 output file - if missing it will be ${project.build.directory}/${title}.${outputType}
outputType String 3.4.3 type of output - either 'pdf' or 'doc'
Default value is: pdf.
User property is: outputType.
pageTitle String 3.4.3 title of pageTitle that will be deleted
Default value is: ${project.build.finalName}.
User property is: confluence.page.
parentPageTitle String 3.4.3 Confluence target confluence's spaceKey
Default value is: Home.
User property is: confluence.parentPage.
password String 3.4.3 Confluence password
User property is: confluence.password.
serverId String 3.1.1 Issue 39 Server's id in settings.xml to look up username and password. Defaults to ${url} if not given.
User property is: confluence.serverId.
username String 3.4.3 Confluence username
User property is: confluence.userName.

Parameter Details

endPoint:

Confluence end point url
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confluence.endPoint
  • Default: http://localhost:8080/rpc/xmlrpc

outputFile:

output file - if missing it will be ${project.build.directory}/${title}.${outputType}
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No

outputType:

type of output - either 'pdf' or 'doc'
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No
  • User Property: outputType
  • Default: pdf

pageTitle:

title of pageTitle that will be deleted
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confluence.page
  • Default: ${project.build.finalName}

parentPageTitle:

Confluence target confluence's spaceKey
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confluence.parentPage
  • Default: Home

password:

Confluence password
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confluence.password

serverId:

Issue 39 Server's id in settings.xml to look up username and password. Defaults to ${url} if not given.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.1.1
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confluence.serverId

spaceKey:

Confluence target confluence's spaceKey
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: confluence.spaceKey

username:

Confluence username
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 3.4.3
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confluence.userName
